participant_1.name: Kai Yamamoto
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Kai is passionate about music and values personal authenticity. He is open-minded but struggles with fear of acceptance from his family.
participant_1.background: I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams. I am a seventh day adventist. My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock. I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.

participant_2.name: Maya El-Amin
participant_2.personality: Maya is friendly and supportive, often putting others' needs before her own. She balances her busy life with a positive outlook and enjoys cooking as a form of relaxation.
participant_2.background: I will continue to play music with my friends to help relieve stress and enjoy myself. I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job. I enjoy cooking but not baking. I can speak Arabic, English, and French. My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.

content.text: I'm from the US, but I speak Arabic, English and French. Where are you from?
I'm from Japan. I'm moving to the US soon to pursue my dreams. I'm a little nervous about it, but I'm excited!
That's awesome! What are your dreams?
I want to be a musician. I play the drums and I love punk rock. I'm going to be working as a doorman at a club where they play punk rock in the evenings.
That's so cool! I play music with my friends to help relieve stress and enjoy myself. I'm glad you're pursuing your dreams!
Thanks! I'm nervous about my family not accepting me if I tell them I'm gay, but I'm going to try to tell them.
I'm sure they'll accept you. You're their child and they love you. I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job.
I hope you're right. Thanks for talking with me, it's nice to meet you!
It was nice meeting you too! Good luck with your move and your music career!
